page.title: 12MY LIFE IN CROSSGATES
page.content: My name is{Paul Mulheim,}I was born in 1976 making me 9 years old. I have a brother called Andrew who is 14 years old, and two sisters, Clare who is 11 years old and Mary who is 11 months old. I live at 21,Kingswear Crescent, Leeds 15. My{hobbies}are playing cricket, designing things with Lego such as buildings and cars. I have a computer which is a Sinclair Spectrum 48K. I enjoy playing games on it. I also collect coins from different places, I read a lot especially adventure books and spend time gardening. I go to Saint Theresa's Primary School Where I am in class ten. My teacher is Miss Stewart and she is very nice. My{best subjects are Science, Maths and Art. I enjoy my life in Crossgates and I hope to grow up to be a happy person.
